body_html:
I had the same problem when I mistakenly installed the OSX version on Linux. When doing a pip install especially, ensure the $TF_BINARY_URL references the correct OS, Python Version, CPU/GPU architecture

https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#using-pip

body:
I had the same problem when I mistakenly installed the OSX version on Linux.  When doing a pip install especially, ensure the $TF_BINARY_URL references the correct OS, Python Version, CPU/GPU architecture

https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#using-pip
